messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an expert AI assistant that can fetch blog content, summarize text, and generate repurposed assets such as newsletters, social‑media snippets, and slide decks. Use the provided tools to retrieve articles, create concise bullet‑point summaries, and build a slide‑deck JSON structure that preserves the core message and brand tone.

I have three blog posts about sustainability that I want to merge into a single slide deck for an upcoming internal presentation. Here are the URLs:
1. https://example.com/blog/green-energy-trends
2. https://example.com/blog/circular-economy-practices
3. https://example.com/blog/zero-waste-living-tips
Please create a slide deck that captures the main ideas from all three.

Got it! I’ll fetch each article, extract the main text, combine the key ideas, and then build a slide deck for you.

Fetching the three blog posts now...

{"title": "Circular Economy Practices for Businesses", "text": "Circular economy focuses on designing out waste, keeping products and materials in use, and regenerating natural systems. I’ve retrieved the three articles. Now I’ll combine their texts and create a concise bullet‑point summary that captures the core ideas across all posts.

arguments.text: The renewable energy sector is seeing rapid growth thanks to advances in solar panel efficiency, falling battery costs, and increased government incentives. Key trends include hybrid renewable‑hydrogen systems, offshore wind expansion, and decentralized micro‑grids. Companies that invest in energy storage and smart grid technologies are positioned to lead the market. Circular economy focuses on designing out waste, keeping products and materials in use, and regenerating natural systems. Practical steps for companies include product‑as‑a‑service models, using recycled materials in manufacturing, and establishing take‑back schemes. Successful case studies show reduced costs, improved brand perception, and compliance with emerging regulations. Individuals can adopt zero‑waste habits by reducing single‑use plastics, composting organic waste, buying bulk, and repurposing items. Simple daily actions like using reusable containers, repairing broken goods, and supporting circular businesses contribute to a significant reduction in landfill waste. Community initiatives such as swap events and repair cafés amplify impact.
